THE DARK PASSENGER

slice of life

My name is Ivan and my Alter Ego is Dexter Morgan Proud Aspie and Nerd Compulsive Dreamer by day, Owl by night, Penguin at the weekend Software Developer for love Aspiring Ethical Hacker for as long as I can remember infinite personalities and lives, one for each Book I read and each Song I listen to My dream is to change the world.
